div.div:
[chore][doc] Fix common_project page reference
ext-redmine: #5805, REDMINE-5805
[Description in detail] 1. Fix common_project page reference 2. Change copyright 3. Update conf.py to eliminate warning
Change-Id: I1c81bbf8087fc7066a2d4597508d52b87b896f18

[chore][doc] Fix ipc_queue related doc
ext-redmine: #5805, REDMINE-5805
[Description in detail] 1. Fix ipc_queue.h is not found 2. Fix ipc_queue_device reference error 2. Fix
Change-Id: I2b99700ba504428b0c855bff5584063ad2447498

[bug][build] Fix misuse of CCFLAGS
ext-redmine: #5920, REDMINE-5920
[Description in detail]
Change-Id: I2d01ae0c2644285e58b00cf7e5ac32eb6f3119ad

Revert "[new][all]Add C support to all header files"
This reverts commit e5d8597b28f7cd669f91c732ffe6c7f0519043f3.
Change-Id: Id7761c08079740bbbf238aa20ba4bdae5bee0bc4

[bug][audio] fix audio noise for some ffmpeg file
redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #6028, REDMINE-id
[Description in detail] Describe the change in more detail, e.g. how is the problem fixed, why do you make the modification in this way, explain the feature in more details
Change-Id: Id8f5b05bc4e3173a95bab6a11ca4d88aaeec8abb

[new][example] Add vglite example
redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #5903, REDMINE-5903
[Description in detail]
Change-Id: Ic207d1a02f4cfae7ac43d3a31f9e1dada12c55bd

[opt][example] ZBT lcpu project env define ZBT for 56x ISO
redmine: #5146, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
[Description in detail] lcpu configuration is different whether has ISO or not
Change-Id: Ib0f51edf28c0ccceeb3007d9adeb09f67202492a

[new][all]Add C support to all header files
redmine: #5996, REDMINE-5996
[Description in detail] Add C support to all header files within the SDK (extern "C" {}) [Reply: Github/SiFli-SDK/issues/157]
Change-Id: I17a91a9319cf268eac47e92681cbbfdd572ae7cd

[opt][sdio] Change the printing error message to 'assert'
redmine: #5447, REDMINE-5447
ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
[Description in detail]
Change-Id: I55bb83d374ca9048e7ffc2ab1bb4e26e649c7946

[new][IO] change rgb_led readme
Project: SiFliSDK
ext-redmine: #4820, REDMINE-4820
[Description in detail] change rgb_led readme
Affected branch: [main]
Change-Id: Ib39b42c44df80b3b9f96fa8ccc919be45b74405a

[bug][example] add Add rtconfig.py to the electronic compass
redmine: #5377, REDMINE-5377
ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
[Description in detail]
Change-Id: I881bd8b012055580ab1a568ef6cc4baf190b3bd6

[bug][drv][rng] Fix RNG not work as STOP bit is not cleared
ext-redmine: #6003, REDMINE-6003
[Description in detail] STOP bit is set by HAL_RNG_DeInit but it's not cleared in HAL_RNG_Init. According to HW design, STOP bit should be cleared first, then START bit is set to start the RNG
Change-Id: I3e64a8b6703a5d8c53b2bf0686e0ff8c49c7a0b5

[opt][doc] Update some translation
ext-redmine: #5805, REDMINE-5805
[Description in detail]
Change-Id: I9370441e58621ac05396cb28bc07a5432ecf6017

[new][build] Return child project env.
redmine: #5146, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
[Description in detail] BLE Audio project need to pass flags to LCPU project.
Change-Id: Ic1e921b4ff5ef75e9e21f3e3ffd1c739b756c682

[opt][example] change sf32lb56-lcd_n16r12n1 board's uart port for print lcpu log
redmine: #5146, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
[Description in detail] Describe the change in more detail, e.g. how is the problem fixed, why do you make the modification in this way, explain the feature in more details
Change-Id: Ib246a03c8cfecae9352a5228909620f8af213d27

[new][docs] Add English example index
redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #5991, REDMINE-5991
[Description in detail] If index_EN.md exists in the corresponding example directory, it will be used in the English environment. If index.md is good enough for multilingual environments, then index.md will be used.
Change-Id: I84d01cbeb40f4a42474822d6b8a8e36a5bdadb49

[chore][docs] Add support for example documents in the English Documentation Station
redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #5991, REDMINE-5991
[Description in detail]
Change-Id: Ib34de3c02c296acf35802de97925f9b17ed9f325

ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id

[bug][drv][rng] Fix RNG not work as STOP bit is not cleared
ext-redmine: #6003, REDMINE-6003
[Description in detail] STOP bit is set by HAL_RNG_DeInit but it's not cleared in HAL_RNG_Init. According to HW design, STOP bit should be cleared first, then START bit is set to start the RNG
Change-Id: I3e64a8b6703a5d8c53b2bf0686e0ff8c49c7a0b5
